title: The Place of my Dreams
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Ruby really likes your stage outfit, Mia-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Thanks.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>You’ve watched plays and musicals since you were young, right, Mia-chan? Is that why you come up with those kinds of ideas?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Well, that and being a member of the Taylor family.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby would like to see a play in-person sometime...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>If you get the chance to go, I could show you around.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Really!? Are you sure!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I know the place well. There’s a really good burger shop there too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby wants to go…! Ruby’ll save her allowance and work hard on her English!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I’ll be waiting for the day when we can go together, Ruby.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
